S3021 E03012 FL080/120==

VA CLD OBS AT 1840Z WI S1549 W07150 - S1553 W07128 -
S1607 W07132 - S1608 W07150 - S1549 W07150 SFC/FL270
FCST AT 0100Z VA CLD WI S1546 W07150 - S1558 W07121 -
S1613 W07122 - S1614 W07138 - S1546 W07150 SFC/FL270==

WSUS31 KKCI 062155 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 12E 
VALID UNTIL 2355Z 
VA NC SC AND NC SC CSTL WTRS 
FROM 30S RIC-90ESE ECG-110SSE ECG-60SE FLO-30WNW FLO-30S RIC 
AREA SEV EMBD TS MOV FROM 28025KT. TOPS TO FL390. 
HAIL TO 1 IN...WIND GUSTS TO 50KT POSS. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 062355-070355 
FROM 40S EKN-40SSE CSN-170E ECG-180ESE ECG-60SW ILM-30NNE 
IRQ-30SE VXV-40S EKN 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
